name: Patrick Jaillet
content: Patrick Jaillet Patrick Jaillet Dugald C. Jackson Professor Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science (EECS) ---- Faculty/PI, Laboratory for Information and Decision Systems (LIDS) Member, Operations Research Center (ORC) ---- Room 32-D624 Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) Cambridge, MA 02139 tel: (617) 452-3379 email: last-name@mit.edu General Highlights: short bio; selected publications Research Highlights: online optimization and learning; sequential decision-making under uncertainty; machine learning Teaching Highlights: machine learning; optimization; probability; algorithms; network science Accessibility
